title: Toad crunchies

properties.value: Toad crunchies are a gnome food that can be made with a Cooking level of 10. They heal 8 hitpoints. Toad crunchies may be requested in the Gnome Restaurant minigame. They can also sometimes be received by using the reward token from the minigame. There is also a pre-made version of these, but they cannot be used in the Gnome Restaurant minigame. Toad crunchies are also dropped by tortoises north of the Tree Gnome Village. Like all gnome foods, they stop burning at Cooking level 38.

Item ID2217

Toad crunchies are a gnome food that can be made with a Cooking level of 10. They heal 8 hitpoints. Toad crunchies may be requested in the Gnome Restaurant minigame. They can also sometimes be received by using the reward token from the minigame. There is also a pre-made version of these, but they cannot be used in the Gnome Restaurant minigame. Toad crunchies are also dropped by tortoises north of the Tree Gnome Village. Like all gnome foods, they stop burning at Cooking level 38.

Contents

  • 1 Recipe
  • 2 Creation
    • 2.1 Cooking chance
  • 3 Item sources
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)

Recipe[edit | edit source]

Ingredients:

All of these can be bought from Hudo, except for the toad's legs.

  • 1 Crunchy tray
  • 1 Equa leaves
  • 1 Gianne dough
  • 1 Gnome spice
  • 2 Toad's legs

How to make your own:

  1. Use the Gianne dough on the crunchy tray.
  2. Bake the raw crunchies on a range or gnome cooker.
  3. Right-click on the crunchies and select "Prepare". Choose Toad crunchies.
  4. Use the crunchies on the range again.
  5. Right-click use the equa leaves on the unfinished crunchies.
